plot: Nelly Fitzgerald, a grouchy, lovable, aspiring screenwriter, must contend with being a single mom along with life's little disasters as she tries to finish her latest opus -- a musical based on the sinking of the S.S. Edmund Fitzgerald.
title: Screamwriter
plot_es: Nelly Fitzgerald, a grouchy, lovable, aspiring screenwriter, must contend with being a single mom along with life's little disasters as she tries to finish her latest opus -- a musical based on the sinking of the S.S. Edmund Fitzgerald.
plot_en: Nelly Fitzgerald, a grouchy, lovable, aspiring screenwriter, must contend with being a single mom along with life's little disasters as she tries to finish her latest opus -- a musical based on the sinking of the S.S. Edmund Fitzgerald.
